channel.title: Help with Animations
channel.description:
Ok, so I'm adding all the lunar animations and GFX to my server, and I can't figure out 1 thing, what does this mean: [u][b]if(j == 752)[/b][/u]{ // Emerald bolt spec cache[j].anInt405 = 16941;// Model cache[j].anInt406 = 4446; // animation cache[j].aAnimation_407 = Animation.anims[cache[j].anInt406];// Update }
The animations I got didn't come with them and i need to convert them so I was wondering, what do I put there? And what is it for?

item.title: Help with Animations
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

Ok, so I’m adding all the lunar animations and GFX to my server, and I can’t figure out 1 thing, what does this mean:
if(j == 752){ // Emerald bolt spec
cache[j].anInt405 = 16941;// Model
cache[j].anInt406 = 4446; // animation
cache[j].aAnimation_407 = Animation.anims[cache[j].anInt406];// Update
}

The animations I got didn’t come with them and i need to convert them so I was wondering, what do I put there? And what is it for?

Read full topic
